texto:
Voltei para contar sobre minha segunda experi√™ncia na casas, n√£o poderia ser diferente: 5 estrelas!

Em setembro visitei o restaurante com um grupo de mulheres e tivei uma experi√™ncia ruim. Alguns meses mais tarde, por coincid√™ncia da vida, meu marido conheceu o gerente do Badio em outro restaurante, que prontamente n√≥s presenteou com um rod√≠zio de vinho, para que eu pudesse mudar a impress√£o da minha primeira visita. (Atitude que ganhou muito meu respeito. Sinal de que realmente se importam que os clientes tenham uma boa experi√™ncia na casa).
Tivemos um excelente atendimento, os pratos s√£o muito saborosos e bem elaborados. O rod√≠zio de vinhos √© maravilhoso e o lugar muito aconchegante. Sem falar no atendimento, que tornou essa segunda experi√™ncia ainda mais agrad√°vel.

Recomendo sem d√∫vidas a todos que buscam por uma noite agrad√°vel. Sem d√∫vidas, voltarei novamente.

Fiz quest√£o de vir falar sobre essa segunda experi√™ncia, ainda mais depois de saber que eles l√™em essas avalia√ß√µes.
Desejo muito sucesso a voc√™s e que continuem buscando sempre a satisfa√ß√£o dos clientes!
texto_traduzido:
I came back to tell about my second experience in houses, could not be different: 5 stars!

In September I visited the restaurant with a group of women and had a bad experience. A few months later, coincidentally, my husband met the Badio manager at another restaurant, which we readily presented with a wine carvery, so that I could change the impression of my first visit. (Attitude that has gained a lot of respect. Sign that they really mind that customers have a good experience in the house).
We had excellent service, the dishes are very tasty and well elaborated. The wine carvery is wonderful and the place very cozy. Not to mention the service, which made this second experience even more pleasant.

I undoubtedly recommend to everyone who seeks for a pleasant night. No doubt I will be back again.

I made a point of coming to talk about this second experience, especially after knowing that they read these evaluations.
I wish you a lot of success and always seek customer satisfaction!

texto:
O Kabanas Restaurante e Bar foi fundado em 13 de mar√ßo de 2004 com a iniciativa do Sr. Bol√≠var Siqueira e o seu filho Ricardo Siqueira.

Um dos seus aspectos de maior destaque √© o cuidado com que a estrutura foi projetada e constru√≠da. Todos os detalhes foram cuidadosamente estudados, desde a constru√ß√£o da cozinha, passando pela decora√ß√£o e escolha dos profissionais.

Nossa especialidade √© a cozinha internacional e contamos com mais de 440 r√≥tulos em nossa carta de vinhos.

O Kabanas √© composto por dois ambientes: o restaurante e a choperia. No restaurante, todos os pratos s√£o elaborados com produtos de excelente qualidade, assinados pelo consagrado Restauranter Ricardo Siqueira.

O primeiro restaurante foi aberto em frente ao Parque Vaca Brava, um dos cart√µes-postais mais belos da cidade. Em 2014, inaugurou o Kabanas Flamboyant, situado no P√¥lo Gastron√¥mico do Shopping Flamboyant.¬† Um restaurante com uma cozinha padr√£o internacional e um sal√£o incr√≠vel com projeto da arquiteta renomada Tereza Cristina del Papa. Os m√≥veis do restaurante s√£o todos assinados por artistas de design como o famoso Aristeu Pires, o projeto encanta pela beleza, aconchego e funcionalidade. O ambiente do restaurante conta com uma adega climatizada para mais de 3 mil garrafas dividida em duas temperaturas, a do vinho tinto e a dos vinhos brancos.
texto_traduzido:
Kabanas Restaurante e Bar was founded on March 13, 2004 with the initiative of Mr. Bolivar Siqueira and his son Ricardo Siqueira.

One of its most prominent aspects is the care with which the structure was designed and built. All the details were carefully studied, since the construction of the kitchen, through the decoration and choice of professionals.

Our specialty is international cuisine and we have over 440 labels on our wine list.

Kabanas consists of two environments: the restaurant and the beer. In the restaurant, all the dishes are made with excellent quality products, signed by the consecrated Restauratern Ricardo Siqueira.

The first restaurant was opened in front of Vaca Brava Park, one of the most beautiful postcards in the city. In 2014, he inaugurated the Kabanas Flamboyant, located in the gastronomic pool of Shopping Flamboyant. A restaurant with an international standard kitchen and an amazing hall with a project by renowned architect Tereza Cristina del Papa. The restaurant's furniture are all signed by design artists such as the famous Aristeu Pires, the project enchants for beauty, warmth and functionality. The restaurant's atmosphere has an air -conditioned cellar to over 3,000 bottles divided into two temperatures, red wine and white wines.

texto: Vc que frequenta ou pretende frequenta o Kabanas saiba pq o atendimento √© um dos piores de Goi√¢nia. O Restaurante cobra 12% das compras dos clientes e n√£o repassa para os Gar√ßons. A empresa rouba dos Gar√ßons, esse √© o motivo principal do p√©ssimo atendimento. Dos 12% que a empresa recebe dos clientes, √© repassado menos da metade. Ou seja: a empresa rouba dos Gar√ßons na cara dura, por isso que n√£o para Gar√ßons na empresa sempre tem caras Novas. Vc que frequenta ou pretende frequentar o Kabanas restaurante do shopping flanboyant, n√£o paguem a taxa de serviso ( 12% ) vcs n√£o tem obriga√ß√£o de pagar essa taxa que √© um roubo. Se acaso vc gostar do atendimento do Gar√ßom que te serviu, de uma gorgeta por fora da conta, mais n√£o paguem a taxa de servido, pois a taxa de servido vai para o bolso da empresa. Fica a dica  üñí.
texto_traduzido: You who go to or intend to attend Kabanas know why the service is one of the worst of Goi√¢nia. The restaurant charges 12% of customers' purchases and does not pass on to the waiters. The company steals from the waiters, this is the main reason for the bad service. Of the 12% the company receives from customers, less than half are passed on. That is: the company steals the waiters in the hard face, so not for waiters in the company always has new faces. You who go to or want to attend Kabanas Restaurante from Shopping Flanboyant, do not pay the service fee (12%) you have no obligation to pay this fee that is a theft. If you like the service of the waiter that served you, a gorgeta outside the account, but do not pay the served fee, because the served fee goes to the company's pocket. It is the tip üñí.

texto:
No dia 12/12/2022 me desloquei at√© o estabelecimento do KABANAS no SHOPPING FLAMBOYANT para efetivar a reserva de uma mesa para o REVEILLON, no ato da reserva pagamos o valor referente a R$ 1 mil reais a vista, sendo efetivado a reserva para a MESA 2 (dois).
Ao chegarmos no dia 31/12/2022 para comemorarmos a VIRADA DO ANO, fomos surpreendidos de maneira DESAGRAD√ÅVEL E CONSTRANGEDORA que havia pessoas na nossa mesa que havia sido RESERVADA para mim.
E ao conversamos com o gerente JESUS o mesmo disse que n√£o poderia estar nos ajudando, porque n√≥s quer√≠amos o nosso DIREITO de SENTAR na MESA que foi realizada a RESERVA e n√£o em uma outra mesa QUALQUER ao lado da parede, sendo que n√£o PAGAMOS por ela.
O RESTAURANTE foi muito DESLEGANTE com a gente passamos por uma situa√ß√£o desagrad√°vel e conseguiram ACABAR com a NOSSA COMEMORA√á√ÉO DA VIRADA DE ANO, que DESRESPEITO e DESCASO TOTAL com a gente CONSUMIDOR. E para pior ainda a situa√ß√£o O RESTAURANTE/GERENTE JESUS foi capaz de ALEGAR que havia sido realizado no REMANEJAMENTO das disposi√ß√µes das MESAS, ocorre que em NENHUM MOMENTO o RESTAURENTE entrou em contato com N√ìS, ent√£o N√ÉO CONCORDAMOS com o posicionamento do RESTAURANTE.
O RESTAURANTE jamais pode fazer isso com o CONSUMIDORES que frequenta o Estabelecimento.
E para encerrar colocaram  N√ìS em uma MESA SUPER INFEIRO que N√ÉO condiz pelo valor que PAGAMOS. Estarei buscando meus DIREITOS junto ao ORGAO DE PROTE√á√ÉO/PROCON para que acontecimentos como esse sirva de exemplo.
texto_traduzido:
On 12/12/2022 I went down to the Kabanas establishment at Shopping Flamboyant to reserve a table for New Year's Eve, at the time of the reserve we pay the amount for R $ 1 thousand reais in sight, being made the reserve for Table 2 (two).
When we arrived on 12/31/2022 to celebrate the turn of the year, we were surprised in an unpleasant and embarrassing way that there were people on our table that had been reserved for me.
And when we talked to the manager Jesus the same said that it could not be helping us, because we wanted our right to sit at the table that the reservation was made and not any other table beside the wall, and we did not pay for it .
The restaurant was very disguising with us we went through an unpleasant situation and managed to end our New Year's Eve celebration, which disrespect and total neglect with the consumer people. And even worse the situation the restaurant/manager Jesus was able to claim that it had been held in the relocation of the tables of the tables, it happens that at no time did the restoration contacted us, so we did not agree with the positioning of the restaurant.
The restaurant can never do this with consumers who go to the establishment.
And to close they put us on a super inferred table that does not match the amount we pay. I will be seeking my rights from the Protection/Procon organ so that events like this will serve as an example.

Pedimos um grelhado na brasa de picanha para uma pessoa, na descri√ß√£o do prato fala que √© 200gr de picanha. Pedimos o prato ponto menos, veio dois bifes finos bem passado. We ordered a grilled in the picanha ember for a person, in the description of the dish says it is 200gr of picanha. We ordered the Ponto Ponto less, came two fine steaks well passed. We showed the meat to the waiter and he called the guardian, went to change the plate. The food cooled, the hunger passed and the meat arrived 45 min later.
Worst of all was the kitchen staff to go out at the door and look who complained, leaving the customer embarrassed. Unfortunately this problem is being recurring, as this is the second time it happens to me. Nonetheless, he would not fail to talk about the service in which the waiter and the guardian tried to organize to resolve the situation. He came to the table and apologized for what happened. However, we canceled the order, because I no longer wanted to eat for so long.

texto:
O lugar √© relativamente novo. Poucas op√ß√µes em cervejas se comparado as grandes cervejarias. O mestre cervejeiro √© bacana e simp√°tico. A equipe de baristas √© boa. Agora, a equipe de gar√ßons s√£o √≥timos com exce√ß√£o de uma gar√ßonete, que p√µe tudo a perder para fidelizar o cliente da casa. Cheguei antes das 20h. O chope pilsen Premium deveria vir com o valor menor. Fiquei no balc√£o e me cobraram 10% fui cobrado pela mesma gar√ßonete mal humorada e dei o retorno e ela deu de ombros, ainda fez cara feia e desinteressada. Lembrando o valor do servi√ßo √© opcional. Couvert art√≠stico tamb√©m √© question√°vel juridicamente. O estabelecimento deve pagar o artista e o cliente paga se quiser. Tem que haver placas informativas para melhor sinalizar o cliente da cobran√ßa e n√£o me foi informado da cobran√ßa do couvert. Paguei a conta com 10% e o chope pelo valor normal. Mas, na hora de pensar em cervejaria pensarei 2x. Tem muita cervejaria em Gyn e muitas com qualidade. Fui numa sexta-feira √†s 20h e estava tranquilo. Rodei 40min. para n√£o ser bem tratado por uma atendente. A casa √© ampla. Disseram que ap√≥s √†s 21h fica cheia.
Resolvi avaliar com menos 1* a casa ap√≥s, resposta do respons√°vel. N√£o est√£o preparados para o retorno do cliente. "Interessante" usarem as cr√≠ticas construtivas para responder o cliente e se acharem acima das opini√µes. Geram uma sensa√ß√£o de mal estar. N√£o prefiro cervejas comerciais. Prefiro um bom produto. E isso voc√™s tem. Falta tato e habilidade para receber retornos. Sem ser contradit√≥rio, tem um bom espa√ßo, excelente mestre cervejeiro, por√©m, melhorem o atendimento. Inclusive nas respostas. N√£o esperava por isso. Talvez n√£o precisem de clientes ou clientes como eu que fazem avalia√ß√µes que os desagradam. Lembrando-os que a maioria dos clientes, quando avaliam o estabelecimento s√£o positivos. Irei retornar √† casa, quem sabe serei bem atendido e mudo a minha avalia√ß√£o e tiro essa impress√£o negativa? Com toda humildade de ser especialista em marketing, turismo e gastronomia e doar o meu tempo para ajudar outros clientes. Mas, como digo aos alunos aprendo muito mais que ensino. Valeu!
texto_traduzido:
The place is relatively new. Few beer options compared to large breweries. The brewing master is cool and friendly. The barist team is good. Now the waiters team are great except for a waitress, who puts everything to lose to build customer loyalty. I arrived before 20h. Pilsen Premium draft beer should come with the smaller value. I stayed at the counter and charged me 10% I was charged for the same grumpy waitress and gave the return and she shrugged, still made an ugly and disinterested face. Remembering the value of the service is optional. Artistic cover is also legally questionable. The establishment must pay the artist and the customer pays if he wants. There must be informative signs to better signal the customer of the collection and was not informed of the collection of the cover. I paid the bill with 10% and the beer for normal value. But when I think of a brewery I will think 2x. There are a lot of Gyn brewery and many with quality. I went on Friday at 20h and it was quiet. I rode 40min. not to be treated well by an attendant. The house is wide. They said that after 9 pm it gets full.
I decided to evaluate with less 1* the house after, response from the guardian. They are not prepared for customer return. "Interesting" use constructive criticism to respond to the customer and find themselves above opinions. Generate a feeling of discomfort. I do not prefer commercial beers. I prefer a good product. And that you have. Lack tact and ability to receive returns. Without being contradictory, there is a good space, excellent master brewer, but improve the service. Even in the answers. I didn't expect it. They may not need customers or customers like me who make evaluations that displease them. Remembering them that most customers when they evaluate the establishment are positive. I will return to the house, maybe I will be well attended and change my assessment and take this negative impression? With all the humility of being an expert in marketing, tourism and gastronomy and donating my time to help other customers. But, as I say students I learn much more than I teach. It cost!

texto:
O ambiente ainda est√° em constru√ß√£o e carece de investimentos. Mas √© compreens√≠vel, o dono √© um empreendedor dedicado e est√° se esfor√ßando. A carta de chopps √© simplesmente magn√≠fica, com pre√ßos justos e indica√ß√µes para harmoniza√ßao no card√°pio.

texto: A experi√™ncia podia ser boa pois a comida √© boa e os chopes tamb√©m, todavia o ATENDIMENTO √© RUIM. Quando chegamos, meu marido e eu, o bar estava relativamente vazio, a gar√ßonete que veio atender estava muito mal humorada(o que j√° foi percebido por outros clientes, pois tem outras avalia√ß√µes sobre isso). Quando √≠amos fazer o pedido do prato eu perguntei como funcionava pois o pre√ßo estava "a partir de $$" no card√°pio, a gar√ßonete confirmou quando perguntei que o pre√ßo era aquele mesmo (s√≥ era poss√≠vel ver o menor pre√ßo) e o que o prato servia DE 1 A 2 pessoas e N√ÉO FALOU que o prato tinha 2 apresenta√ß√µes DIFERENTES, PARA 1 E PARA 2 PESSOAS, ela tamb√©m n√£o perguntou sobre o ponto da carne. Quando meu marido n√£o quis outro chope ela fez careta. Precisamos chamar a gar√ßonete umas 2 vezes e outra pessoa nos atendeu, mas estranhamos a demora porque a pessoa mais pr√≥xima estava sempre de olho no celular e n√£o nos clientes, requer aten√ß√£o, mas √© compreens√≠vel. O problema maior foi quando a conta chegou e o valor do prato que pedimos estava praticamente dobrado. Outra atendente explicou que o prato tinha 2 valores, mas OBVIAMENTE ficamos chateados pela informa√ß√£o errada que tivemos da primeira gar√ßonete. PAGAMOS A CONTA APRESENTADA, N√ÉO SOLICITAMOS NENHUM ESTORNO, APESAR DO ACONTECIDO e pedi para falar com a gerente, pois acredito que um empres√°rio que presa pela excel√™ncia no seu neg√≥cio aprecia retorno dos clientes para evitar novos erros, todavia para minha surpresa a GERENTE chegou falando comigo em TOM ACUSAT√ìRIO, COMO SE EU FOSSE A ERRADA DA HIST√ìRIA, perguntou na minha frente se a gar√ßonete tinha dado informa√ß√£o errada e ela, claro, MENTIU NA MINHA CARA E NEGOU TER ERRADO, a gerente continou tentando implicar que o erro foi meu e do meu marido, falando de devolu√ß√£o injusta do dinheiro pelo custo do produto, o que eu NEM tinha pedido, TENTOU ME CONSTRANGER e s√≥ se desculpou quando perguntei se o intuito dela era fazer com que n√£o volt√°ssemos mais l√°. Achei uma tremenda FALTA DE TATO E DESPREPARO DA GERENTE EM LIDAR COM A SITUA√á√ÉO, de maneira que eu n√£o volto mais, N√ÉO RECOMENDO O LUGAR, APESAR, REITERO, DA BOA COMIDA E BEBIDA. Estranho ver um local que ao inv√©s de escutar os clientes e fidelizar prefere gerar uma situa√ß√£o incomoda e ficar com uma atendente ruim.
texto_traduzido: The experience could be good because the food is good and the draft beer too, but the service is bad. When we arrived, my husband and me, the bar was relatively empty, the waitress who came to answer was very moody (which has already been perceived by other customers, because there are other reviews about it). When we were going to order the dish I asked how it worked because the price was "from $$" on the menu, the waitress confirmed when I asked that the price was the same (it was only possible to see the lowest price) and what the dish was It served from 1 to 2 people and did not say that the dish had 2 different performances, for 1 and 2 people, she also did not ask about the meat point. When my husband didn't want another draft she made a grimace. We need to call the waitress about 2 times and someone else answered us, but we strange the delay because the closest person was always watching the cell phone and not on customers, requires attention, but is understandable. The biggest problem was when the account arrived and the value of the dish we ordered was practically doubled. Another attendant explained that the dish had 2 values, but obviously we were upset by the wrong information we had from the first waitress. We paid the account presented, we did not request any chargeback, despite the event and asked to talk to the manager, because I believe that a businessman who trapped by excellence in his business appreciates customers' return to avoid further errors, but to my surprise the manager arrived talking talking With me in accusatory tone, as if I were the wrong of the story, asked in front of me if the waitress had given wrong information and she, of course, lied in my face and denied having wrong, the manager continued to imply that the mistake was mine and From my husband, speaking of unjust return of money for the cost of the product, which I had not even asked, tried to embarrass me and only apologized when I asked if her intent was to make us come back there. I found a tremendous lack of tact and unpreparedness of the manager to deal with the situation, so that I no longer come back, I do not recommend the place, although, I reiterate, good food and drink. Strange to see a place that instead of listening to customers and loyalty prefers to generate an uncomfortable situation and get a bad attendant.

N√£o pude deixar de notar o coment√°rio da Fl√°via a√≠ embaixo, sobre a gar√ßonete,  ent√£o vim aqui colocar outro ponto de vista na hist√≥ria.

Primeiramente foi eu que distribui os pratos no dia em quest√£o, e sim, faltou 1 (um) pois eram 7 (sete) pessoas na mesa e levei apenas 6 (seis) pratos, mas por um erro que foi corrigido em sequ√™ncia, por√©m esses pratos n√£o foram distribu√≠dos por nenhum integrante da equipe de colaboradores e sim por um integrantes da pr√≥pria mesa. Ent√£o al√©m de ser conflitante com a hist√≥ria citada por ela, ainda seria uma falta de profissionalismo al√©m de ultrajante se a gar√ßonete fizesse o que ela disse na frente do esposo.

texto_traduzido:
I couldn't help but notice Fl√°via's comment under the waitress, so I came here to put another point of view in the story.
I will not put facts of free interpretation like knowing my wife, because as I said, they are interpretative.
First of all, I distribute the dishes on the day in question, and yes, 1 (one) because there were 7 (seven) people on the table and took only 6 (six) dishes, but by an error that was corrected in sequence, but these Dishes were not distributed by any member of the team of employees but by a members of the table itself. So besides being conflicting with the story quoted by her, it would still be a lack of professionalism besides being outrageous if the waitress did what she said in front of her husband.
Now, I think the person has to think a little before making such accusations, because when it happens it is clear that either he goes through a fictional disorder of reality or has some self -esteem problem, besides a little envy of people who They are apparently more pleasant (which happens with the case of Valentine TBM or Kkkk spouse).
The restaurant's food is excellent, varied and has great value, besides anyone of the team treats the customer in the best way possible

texto:
A experi√™ncia que eu tive hoje foi P√âSSIMA gra√ßas a um atendente que aceitou ser subordinado por m√≠seros R$10,00. Cheguei por volta das 22:10h e fui muito bem atendida por um rapaz para o qual pedi bebida e comida j√° de prontid√£o. E gentilmente pedi ao seguran√ßa para entrar na fila de espera para jogar sinuca e o mesmo com a mesma gentileza me disse que eu j√° estava nela. Esperei por volta de uma hora a comida (o que √© totalmente compreens√≠vel por conta da quantidade de pessoas no bar) e esperei tamb√©m com paci√™ncia a mesa de sinuca. At√© que chegaram dois rapazes na mesa ao lado, chamaram um outro atendente e soltaram a seguinte frase pra ele: ‚Äúeu t√¥ na fila de espera ali e tem 6 na frente. Voc√™ consegue fazer uma m√°gica e me colocar como pr√≥ximo? Te dou 10 conto‚Äù.
O rapaz n√£o falou com o seguran√ßa (respons√°vel pela fila de espera) e me senti aliviada em ver que ele tinha um pingo de car√°ter e respeito com os outros clientes que aguardavam. At√© que PARA A MINHA SURPRESA, ele em menos de 5 min veio buscar os dois rapazes e levar eles para a mesa. LEZANDO todos os outros que esperavam.
Minha comida havia acabado de chegar mas fiquei t√£o decepcionada que de imediato chamei o rapaz que me atendia desde o in√≠cio, falei pra ele o que aconteceu ele rapidamente se prop√¥s a me ajudar, mas eu fiquei t√£o decepcionada que decidi ir embora. N√£o toquei na comida que tinha acabado de chegar por√©m paguei por tudo e me retirei. O dinheiro de ningu√©m l√° valia mais que o meu!!!
Feedback: cobrem taxa de servi√ßo mas, por favor, sejam democr√°ticos e respeitosos com os clientes.
Eu at√© liguei posteriormente porque queria recompensar com um pix o rapaz que me atendeu mas ele √© t√£o √©tico que n√£o aceitou apesar da minha insist√™ncia.
Espero que o rapaz que se vendeu por t√£o pouco melhore e seja mais justo com os outros.
texto_traduzido:
The experience I had today was terrible thanks to an attendant who agreed to be subordinated by a meager $ 10.00. I arrived around 22:10 and was very well attended by a boy for whom I asked for drink and food ready. And kindly asked the security guard to get in the waiting line to play pool and the same kind of kindness told me that I was already in it. I waited at about an hour the food (which is totally understandable because of the number of people at the bar) and also waited with the pool table too with patience. Until two boys arrived at the next table, they called another attendant and released the following sentence to him: ‚ÄúI'm in the waiting line there and has 6 in front. Can you do a magic and put me like next? I give you 10 tale. ‚Äù
The boy did not talk to the security guard (responsible for the waiting line) and I felt relieved to see that he had a shred of character and respect with the other customers who were waiting. Until to my surprise, he in less than 5 min came fetch the two boys and take them to the table. Reading all the others who expected.
My food had just arrived but I was so disappointed that I immediately called the boy who was serving me from the beginning, I told him what happened he quickly set me on helping me, but I was so disappointed that I decided to leave. I didn't touch the food I had just arrived but I paid for everything and retired. Nobody's money there was more than mine !!!
Feedback: Cover service fee but please be democratic and respectful with customers.
I even called later because I wanted to reward with a pix the boy who answered me but he is so ethical that he did not accept despite my insistence.
I hope the boy who has sold himself for so little improve and is fairer with others.

I have been a frequent frequency of Bottega since 2014, today, the only reason that makes me continue to attend is the care of Glory, Miguel and Douglas.

texto_traduzido:
My experience in this bar was extremely unpleasant. The served portions were very small, the pastel was extremely oily and old -looking, left much to be desired. In addition to the problem with food, the menu had prices well above, which did not match the quality of food served.

To top it off, the irregularity of the floor where the chairs eventually caused an accident with a colleague, whose chair broke in half and she went to the ground. Unfortunately, none of the bar employees apologized. Bad management of everything!

It is noteworthy that those responsible for this bar are also owners of another establishment in Goi√¢nia, called Salve, where the same reported problems can be found.

I do not intend to return to these two establishments and I do not recommend it to anyone I know.

texto: Experi√™ncia ruim. Compareci para desfrutar da promo√ß√£o de R$50 open drink. No in√≠cio foi bem, depois do terceiro drink come√ßaram a avacalhar, as bebidas passaram a vir horr√≠veis, fora a demora de 20-30 min pra servir uma bebida com a casa vazia. O gar√ßom as vezes via o cliente levantando a m√£o e virava o rosto, at√© alternar a  pessoa que estava servindo a mesa. Al√©m de tudo, ouvi menos de 1h  de m√∫sica ao vivo pra me cobrarem couvert. Solicitei ao metre que retirasse os 10% de uma conta de mais de R$200, o mesmo me pressionou para pagar o valor aos gar√ßons, tentando negociar o valor da taxa de servi√ßo em troca de um couvert. Deixei claro a minha insatisfa√ß√£o em pagar a taxa de servi√ßo que POR LEI NAO √â OBRIGATORIA, sugeri e refor√ßo a sugestao de inclu√≠rem os 10% no valor dos produtos do card√°pio (que j√° n√£o s√£o l√° t√£o baratos).  Simplesmente n√£o volto mais nesse local, achei de uma tremenda falta de delicadeza e bom senso pressionarem e constrangerem o cliente para pagar taxas.
texto_traduzido: Bad experience. I attended to enjoy the promotion of $ 50 open drink. At first it did well, after the third drink began to be availed, the drinks came horrible, apart from the delay of 20-30 min to serve a drink with the empty house. The waiter sometimes saw the client raising his hand and turned his face until he alternated the person serving the table. In addition, I heard less than 1h of live music to charge me cover. I asked Metre to remove the 10% of a account of more than $ 200, the same pressed me to pay the value to the waiters, trying to negotiate the value of the service fee in exchange for a cover charge. I made clear my dissatisfaction in paying the service fee that is not required by law, I suggested and reinforce the suggestion of including 10% in the value of the menu products (which are no longer so cheap). I just don't come back in this place, I found a tremendous lack of delicacy and common sense to press and embarrass the customer to pay fees.

texto:
Os peixes que passam a mesa s√£o bons, pastel de cream cheese e goiabada delicioso. Mas o buffet estava bem fraco. Sem contar que por telefone nos foi informado que fechavam as 15:30 para novos clientes mas quem estava no sal√£o permanecia. Chegamos √†s 14 e tivemos que comer correndo pq as 15 os gar√ßons j√° estavam at√© fechando as cortinas. Liguei antes, era s√≥ ter dado a informa√ß√£o completa. The fish that pass the table are good, cream cheese and delicious guava. But the buffet was very weak. Tomato sushi (it makes no sense) and very little frozen and cut and cut very thick. I believe that by value we can eat in a better place. Not to mention that by phone we were informed that they would close at 15:30 to new customers but who was in the salon remained. We arrived at 14 and had to eat running because the 15 waiters were even closing the curtains. I called before, just gave the full information. I take advantage and make a compliment to the manager who tried with a lot of sympathy to get around the situation but we prefer to leave.
A pity, I've been a customer for years but today I don't think it's worth it.

texto: O Bar do Peixe √© um restaurante antigo e tradicional, o pre√ßo do rod√≠zio √© muito justo, acho que √© R$56,90 individual e R$104,90 o casal. O chope √© super gelado, √© Brahma e custa R$9,90. Eles cobram os 10% e a sobremesa n√£o √© inclusa [a bebida tamb√©m n√£o], mas o rod√≠zio tem pastel de Romeu e Julieta [perfeitooo!], banana com canela empanada e abacaxi assado com canela, ent√£o nem precisa muito de sobremesa kkkk A comida no geral √© muito gostosa e bem feita e o ambiente tamb√©m, dando 4 estrelas por causa do tempero. E fui com meu esposo e cobraram o rod√≠zio individual, sendo que h√° a possibilidade do pre√ßo de casal [que sai mais barato], atentem-se ao conferir a conta. Mas √© s√≥. De resto, tudo perfeito ‚ô•
texto_traduzido: Bar do Peixe is an old and traditional restaurant, the price of the rotation is very fair, I think it is $ 56.90 individual and $ 104.90 the couple. It pays a lot because of the cuts [the variety is not large, has common fish and some 4 different], the buffet has a lot of variety and is very tasty and well done. The draft beer is super cold, is Brahma and costs $ 9.90. They charge the 10% and the dessert is not included [the drink is not], but the rotation has pastel from Romeo and Juliet [perfectoo!], Banana with breaded cinnamon and baked pineapple with cinnamon, so it doesn't even need dessert kkkk a Food in general is very hot and well done and the atmosphere too, giving 4 stars because of seasoning. All fish are seasoned the same, so it gets nauseating/similar. And I went with my husband and charged the individual rotation, and there is the possibility of the price of couple [which comes out cheaper], pay attention to the account. But it's just. Otherwise, all perfect ‚ô•

O atendimentonda galera, como sempre, √© show! Sinceramente, o que salvou a noite foi o pastelzinho de creamchesse com goiabada, estava sensacional...
O camar√£o empanado de longe estava bonito, mas ao colocar no prato j√° veio o cheiro forte (como aqueles de camar√µes secos, n√£o dos frescos) e n√£o tava dando pra comer, o sabor deixouna desejar. Por hora, n√£o penso em voltar ao local.

Great food, great service ... I just think they could put a bench or chair for the girl who takes care of the playroom can sit at times when the situation is quieter! EDT.
Two years later, I come to reevaluate ...
We were there yesterday, the Toy Library girl continues without having a place to sit down.
Yesterday the food left a lot to be desired, well without salt, and apparently the buffet was reduced or did not expect the number of people who appeared yesterday. It would be nice to rethink the issue of the tables, as there were families of 3 people occupying tables for 6 people while many people expected outside. The service guys, as always, is a show! Honestly, what saved the night was Creamchesse's pastry with guava, it was sensational ...
The breaded shrimp from afar was beautiful, but when putting on the plate came the strong smell (like those of dry prawns, not the fresh) and was not giving to eat, the taste made it. For now, I don't think about returning to the place.
The atmosphere is good, is clean and organized, but you have a high added value to be there and, amazing, the parking lot of the site, for your customers, is paid ü§°. They need to improve too much in the taste and quality of food to really be worth it.

Sai de um local que j√° frequento na avenida Mil√£o para conhecer esse estabelecimento, estava um pouco cheio, mas isso n√£o foi o problema !

Mas tempo se passou perguntei outras tr√™s vezes e cada vez ele falava 15 minutos com cara de deboche ,
foi quando pedi para colocar para levar !

texto_traduzido:
I left a place that I already go to Avenida Milan to know this establishment, was a little full, but that was not the problem!
We made the order it took a long time,
And we asked the waiter how long it would be long!
For it was more than an hour, he said: for God's sake right, you just made the request, look at you around you as it is!
Because it would be acceptable on behalf of the place!
But the tone of the waiter that was not good! ‚Ä¶ It took everyone out of the table a little seriously, but we didn't say anything and we expect another 40 minutes‚Ä¶
But time passed asked three more times and each time he spoke 15 minutes with mockery,
That's when I asked to put it!
The packaging left something to be desired,
But the food was at least good!
We do not pay the 10% due to poor service!
But I will return to the place and will evaluate again

texto:
RECADO PARA ANIVERSARIANTE
A rodada de chopp ou shot √© s√≥ at√© as 19hrs. Em momento algum foi informado hor√°rio para entrega do ‚Äúbrinde‚Äù mas a todo momento que pergunt√°vamos, os gar√ßons diziam que tinha que esperar a mesa ter a lota√ß√£o m√≠nima (10 pessoas). Pois bem, a mesa lotou ap√≥s as 21hrs e n√£o quiseram entregar os choops nem os shots pq j√° tinha passado das 19hrs‚Ä¶. Ou seja, informa√ß√µes contradit√≥rias, depois de um di√°logo constrangedor com a ‚Äúgerencia‚Äù conseguimos, mas fato absolutamente desnecess√°rio se as informa√ß√µes fossem claras no atendimento pr√©vio tanto de rede social quanto com os gar√ßons.
Pre√ßos de bebidas acima da m√©dia de qualquer outro bar (16,90 cervejas de 600ml), a quantidade de comida por por√ß√£o √© muito pequena, chega a ser engra√ßado (ainda mais em rela√ß√£o ao valor) sendo que vc j√° paga pra entrar. Enfim. Valores altos pra tudo e informa√ß√£o de menos pra quem quer comemorar algo.
texto_traduzido:
Birthday Message
The beer or shot round is only until 19hrs. At no time has been informed time to deliver the "toast" but at all times we asked, the waiters said they had to wait for the table to have the minimum capacity (10 people). Well, the table filled after 21hrs and did not want to deliver the choops or the shots because it had already passed from 19hrs‚Ä¶. That is, contradictory information, after an embarrassing dialogue with the "management" we succeeded, but absolutely unnecessary if the information was clear in the prior care of both social network and the waiters.
Above average drink prices of any other bar (16.90 600ml beers), the amount of food per serving is very small, is funny (even more than the value) and you already pay to enter. Anyway. High values ‚Äã‚Äãfor everything and less information for those who want to celebrate something.

Minha experi√™ncia no Tio S√©rgio Gastrobar foi incr√≠vel. O ambiente √© simplesmente maravilhoso, criando uma atmosfera aconchegante e convidativa. Al√©m disso, devo ressaltar que o Ceviche servido l√° foi um dos mais saborosos que j√° provei. Uma combina√ß√£o de ingredientes frescos e temperos na medida certa realmente impressionou.

Um dos pontos positivos do Tio S√©rgio Gastrobar √© o pre√ßo justo dos pratos. Considerando a qualidade da comida e o ambiente agrad√°vel, √© uma op√ß√£o que oferece um √≥timo custo-benef√≠cio.

Um dos pontos positivos do Tio S√©rgio Gastro Bar √© o pre√ßo justo dos pratos. Considerando a qualidade da comida e o ambiente agrad√°vel, √© uma op√ß√£o que oferece um √≥timo custo-benef√≠cio.

Em resumo, o Tio S√©rgio Gastrobar √© altamente recomendado. Com um ambiente maravilhoso, um dos melhores Ceviches que j√° provei, pre√ßos justos e m√∫sica ao vivo, √© um lugar que certamente vale a visita.
texto_traduzido:
My experience in Uncle Sergio Gastrobar was amazing. The atmosphere is simply wonderful, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere. In addition, I must point out that the ceviche served there was one of the most tasty I have ever tasted. A combination of fresh ingredients and spices just right actually impressed.

One of the positive points of Uncle S√©rgio Gastrobar is the fair price of the dishes. Considering the quality of the food and the pleasant environment, it is an option that offers a great value for money.

One of the positive points of Uncle S√©rgio Gastro Bar is the fair price of the dishes. Considering the quality of the food and the pleasant environment, it is an option that offers a great value for money.

In addition, another highlight is the presence of live music. This provides an even more enjoyable experience, perfectly complementing the relaxed environment of the place.

In short, Uncle S√©rgio Gastrobar is highly recommended. With a wonderful environment, one of the best ceviches I have ever tasted, fair prices and live music, is a place that is certainly worth the visit.

texto_traduzido: Environment is pleasant, beer is not so cheap (Amstel is $ 1 cheaper than Heineken and the original same price as Amstel). I ordered a portion of the "Board Picanha", a waiter said he has 500gr of picanha, but did not even come 200gr, we complained to the waiter who confessed that we were not the first to complain about the amount of picanha in the portion. First waiter that answered us, was not so in love, and the second treated us much better. There was a moment that all the waiters disappeared, but I realized that this happens frequently, because everyone was in the same place (I believe it is the kitchen, but when everyone left the same place, I did not see any with dish ready to deliver). The bar itself is clean, but still needs to improve a lot in service, values ‚Äã‚Äãand dishes.

Primeira vez que fomos ao lugar e, a princ√≠pio, ficamos na varanda e s√≥ depois das 22h entramos para curtir as bandas maravilhosas que estavam l√° naquela noite.

First time we went to the place and, at first, we stayed on the porch and only after 10 pm did we entered to enjoy the wonderful bands that were there that night.
Already installed inside the bar we find it strange everyone sitting and, to cheer up that country bar we started rehearsing a few steps and suddenly the Metre/Manager and rudely says it was forbidden to dance there and showed us the "forbidden sign Dance "and added that if we wanted to dance we would have to go anywhere else in Goi√¢nia, except there. That's when, immediately, by "coincidence" comes to the realization that we had not asked!
What happened there was a tremendous lack of respect! We were practically sent away from a place we never went, we don't know the story and that makes everyone move and dancing sitting and with a pan face in their chairs! If you want to dance go elsewhere and pass away if they will be expelled !!
Honestly, I will never come back!
If you do not want dance, do not put bands there but ambient music.
I do not recommend at all !!!

texto:
Gostei do lugar: ambiente bonito, o que pedi de comida estava bem feita, a cerveja gelada.
Por√©m, tem um problema que considero central: *conseguem cobrar MAIS CARO na √ÅGUA mineral do QUE na CERVEJA*. Isso √© realmente absurdo e abusivo. Se querem uma √°gua de renome, que tamb√©m disponibilizem outra op√ß√£o menos extorsiva.
Na realidade, trata-se de quest√£o de sa√∫de, o certo mesmo seria, por educa√ß√£o e bom senso, disponibilizar a √°gua da casa, pot√°vel, como √© feito em muitos lugares do mundo, agora o oposto, cobrar pre√ßos abusivos por uma simples √°gua, passa do limite do bom senso.
Eu, por exemplo, tenho o h√°bito saud√°vel de consumir as mesmas quantidades de √°gua e de bebida alco√≥lica, por fazer uso de medica√ß√£o e mesmo para evitar ressaca no dia seguinte, por fim, quest√£o de sa√∫de. No entanto, as pr√°ticas desses restaurantes tornam as op√ß√µes saud√°veis menos convidativas, pagar o dobro nas cervejas acaba at√© te tirando o prazer de estar no local.
N√£o considero que seja uma quest√£o apenas de valores, ou melhor, seria uma quest√£o de outros tipos de valores.
Espero que um dia a educa√ß√£o avance por aqui...
Obs: perguntei sobre a √°gua da casa e o gar√ßom afirmou que n√£o existe no local.
Uma garrafa de √°gua de 300 ml curava mais de R$9 , na op√ß√£o mais barata, visto que havia tb uma segunda op√ß√£o, por R$30, enquanto uma garrafa de 600 ml da "Cerveja Original", por exemplo, sa√≠a por R$17.
texto_traduzido:
I liked the place: Beautiful atmosphere, which I asked for food was well done, the cold beer.
However, there is a problem that I consider central: *They can charge more in mineral water than in beer *. This is really absurd and abusive. If you want a renowned water, which also make available another less extortive option.
In fact, it is a health issue, the right one would be, for education and common sense, to make the house water, potable, as it is done in many places in the world, now the opposite, charge abusive prices for a simple water , passes the limit of common sense.
I, for example, have a healthy habit of consuming the same amounts of water and alcohol, for using medication and even to avoid hangover the next day, finally, health issue. However, the practices of these restaurants make healthy options less inviting, paying double the beers ends up taking the pleasure of being in place.
I do not consider it to be a matter of values, or rather would be a matter of other types of values.
I hope that one day education will advance here ...
Note: I asked about the housewater and the waiter said it does not exist in place.
A 300 ml water bottle cured more than $ 9 in the cheapest option, as there was also a second option for $ 30, while a 600 ml bottle of "original beer", for example, came out for $ 17.

It seems everytime i eat somewhere different the food just gets better.

Oh yes, being with my fiance who had a prawn and rice something or other that she swooned over. The service was top notch and the restaurant was inviting and relaxed. A small kids area kept the children occupied and every now and they one would run back to their table to take a bite of dinner and a drink then run back as fast as their little legs could carry them in case they missed out on 39 seconds of fun.
If in Goiania, this restaurant is a must visit

Cheguei ao estabelecimento por volta de 19:50h, neste momento n√£o houve fila, informei que precisava de uma mesa para 15 pessoas, umas das mo√ßas na entrada informou que n√£o tinha est√° disponibilidade,  respondeu de forma ligeiramente mal educada que somente para oito pessoas (haviam v√°rias mesas vazias no interior do bar) e caso eu desejasse a mesa com 15 lugares precisaria comprar camarote ( na promo√ß√£o ela me faria a R$ 2.300). Pegamos a tal mesa com oito lugares e quando chegou um convidado a mais que os 8 lugares, o gar√ßom prontamente se disponibilizou a arrumar uma cadeira extra. Na entrada do bar, meu convidado teve problemas para conseguir entrar. N√£o queriam autorizar sua entrada, mesmo eu mostrando a cadeira livre e agiram com extrema ma educa√ß√£o. . A experi√™ncia que tenho com bares s√£o os funcion√°rios fazendo o melhor para seus clientes adentrarem e se sentirem o mais confort√°vel poss√≠vel. L√°, ao contr√°rio, eles dificultam/limitam a entrada. Para sair ( sa√≠da r√°pida/ atender o celular), foi o mesmo caos, VOC√ä PRECISA PEDIR PERMISS√ÉO PARA O GAR√áOM DEIXAR VOC√ä SAIR DO BAR, ele avisa ao seguran√ßa e te libera (por√©m, as vezes mesmo com a libera√ß√£o do gar√ßom, o seguran√ßa segura SUA SA√çDA do bar). O show foi muito bom, a comida foi interessante, valores dentro do esperado e gar√ßons educados. Mas o pessoal da portaria foi uma m√° experi√™ncia a parte, muita falta de educa√ß√£o e completamente sem no√ß√£o. N√£o recomendo, n√£o volto! Goi√¢nia tem v√°rios lugares bacanas que de fato valem nossa experi√™ncia e dinheiro !
texto_traduzido: I contacted the bar (contact purchased via Instagram) during the week to try to make a reservation. They reported that they did not work with reservations for Saturday. Ok. I arrived at the establishment around 19:50, at this time there was no line, I said that I needed a table for 15 people, one of the girls at the entrance reported that there was no availability, responded slightly rudely that only for eight People (there were several empty tables inside the bar) and if I wished the table with 15 seats I would need to buy box (on promotion she would make me $ 2,300). We took such a table with eight seats and when a guest arrived more than the 8 seats, the waiter promptly made it available to fix an extra chair. At the entrance of the bar, my guest had trouble getting in. They did not want to authorize their entrance, even though I show the free chair and acted with extreme education. . The experience I have with bars is the employees doing the best for their customers to enter and feel as comfortable as possible. There, on the contrary, they make it difficult/limit the entry. To get out (quick exit/ answer the phone), it was the same chaos, you need to ask the waiter to let you get out of the bar, he warns the security and releases you (but sometimes even with waiter release, security hold your departure from the bar). The show was very good, the food was interesting, values ‚Äã‚Äãin expected and educated waiters. But the ordinance staff was a bad experience aside, a lot of lack of education and completely clueless. I do not recommend, I do not come back! Goi√¢nia has several cool places that really are worth our experience and money!

The fact that they have not warned is not the problem, the problem and that the entrance girl came to want to discuss me because I had asked for the refund of the paid cover value. I thought it was super unaffected and unnecessary that it comes to tell me that there is a "pub", a nightclub, and that people usually stand and that if I wanted to sit, other than in a pub. I think this should not even be discussed because the customer is not required to know that for him to sit at this establishment he should make a reservation, this could have been informed at the entrance. There were empty tables, but I chose to leave because they were not in the mood for standing (my right), it does not give the person's right without education and embarrassing with the client.

texto: Espa√ßo muito bonito, mesmo. Atendimento impec√°vel! Por√©m, para a inten√ß√£o da experi√™ncia (comer bem) pecou um pouco, do meu ponto de vista. Uma das entradas √© pass√≠vel de adapta√ß√£o para ser vegana. E as entradas, minha e do meu marido, estavam impec√°veis. Apresenta√ß√£o, sabor, quantidade. Incr√≠vel mesmo. O prato principal, decepcionou, dos dois. O meu estava salgado e o que seria uma moqueca vegana estava com sabor de sopa de legumes, n√£o lembrava nem o tempero de moqueca. O dele estava muito bonito, mas a carne tinha partes duras de m√∫sculo e o prato no geral tamb√©m passou no sal. De sobremesa, ele comeu a rabanada que veio muito bonita tamb√©m, mas muito neutra de sabor. O drink que pedi era o Ginger beer, n√£o √°lcoolico e extremamente saboroso. texto_traduzido: Very beautiful space, really. Impeccable service! However, for the intention of the experience (eating well) sinned a little from my point of view. We ordered the Goi√¢nia Restaurant Week executive menu. He disappointed right away because he had no option for vegan dessert, but allowed me to exchange for another starter or for an express coffee. One of the entries is subject to adaptation to be vegan. And the entrances, mine and my husband, were impeccable. Presentation, taste, quantity. Amazing indeed. The main course, disappointed, of the two. Mine was salty and what would be a vegan moqueca was flavored with vegetable soup, did not even remember the spice of moqueca. His was very beautiful, but the meat had hard parts of muscle and the dish in general also passed the salt. With dessert, he ate the french toast that came very beautiful too, but very neutral of flavor. The drink I ordered was Ginger Beer, not alcoholic and extremely tasty. I was very positively surprised. Very cool the experience and know that Goianiense gastronomy has offered new options, including for vegan diets.

texto:
Vou come√ßar pelos pontos positivos:

Est√° anunciado aqui no Google que o hor√°rio de encerramento √© 00:00. Cheguei na "casa de coquetelaria" (entre aspas e explico o porqu√™ posteriormente) um pouco antes das 23:20, quarenta minutos antes do suposto encerramento. Ok. Pedi 5 cocktails para provar. Pedi que viessem na medida em que ficassem prontos. N√£o vieram e mandaram todos juntos, mas ok, erraram na t√©cnica, n√£o vou fazer drama sobre isso.

Problema pra mim, est√° na supervisora vir at√© mim, e falar, as 23:30: vamos servir dois drinks em copos de vidro. Os outros 3 s√£o no de isopor pra viagem. Detalhe: n√£o pedi nada pra viagem. Coquetelaria premium no copo de isopor pra viagem porque a casa quer que vc v√° embora?

Oiiii 2? Vim numa casa de coquetelaria pra ter uma experi√™ncia e querem me oferecer drinks pr√© prontos comerciais engarrafados? S√©rio?

Ae vem a atendente simp√°tica querendo corrigir o atendimento da outra, mas tarde demais. J√° entendemos que temos que sair dali urgentemente, afinal a pressa √© de todos.

Equipe e coquetelaria:
Os bartenders devem estar muito compenetrados, pois n√£o h√° nenhum esbo√ßo de sorriso para as pessoas que est√£o indo ali provar o servi√ßo deles. √â somos definitivamente um inc√¥modo.

Em resumo, o resultado de todos, com leve margem para + ou para - √© uma s√≥: um cocktail que DEFINITIVAMENTE N√ÉO VAI ficar na minha mem√≥ria, exceto pelo atendimento da supervis√£o, que n√£o vale um centavo. texto_traduzido:
I will start with the positive points:
The atmosphere is beautiful. A single attendant is friendly.

End.

Now let's go to reality:

Service:
It is announced here on Google that the closing time is 00:00. I arrived at the "cocktail house" (between quotes and explain why later) just before 23:20, forty minutes before the alleged closure. We were informed right away at 23:30. I questioned because on Google says 00:00 and yet it was not even 23:30. They reported that I could ask until 23:30, and stay in the house until 00:00. Ok. I ordered 5 cocktails to prove. I asked them to come to the extent that they were ready. They didn't come and they all sent together, but ok, they missed the technique, I won't do drama about it.

Problem for me, it is in the supervisor to come to me, and talk, at 23:30: let's serve two drinks in glass cups. The other 3 are in Styrofoam for travel. Detail: I didn't ask for anything for a trip. Premium cocktail in the Styrofoam cup for travel because the house wants you to leave?

They noticed my fright face. Their answer to my face: ‚ÄúWe have bottled drinks, if you prefer and can you take it for the trip?‚Äù
Oiiii 2? I came to a cocktail house to have an experience and want to offer me pre -ready -made branched commercial drinks? Serious?

AE comes the friendly attendant wanting to correct the service of the other, but too late. We already understand that we have to leave urgently, after all the hurry is everyone.

Team and cocktail:
The bartenders must be very competed, as there is no smile outline for the people who are going there to taste their service. It is definitely a discomfort.

Now let's talk about the quality of the cocktails: the cocktails are complex, with first ingredients, which in mix of this size, generate expectation about the taste. In short, the result of all, with slight margin for + or for - is one: a cocktail that will definitely not be in my memory, except for the service of supervision, which is not worth a penny. The cocktails are kind of water, and give a soooo soooo strange impression for those who understand the subject a little. I'm talking about all 5, without exception.

Does the house have potential? Yes, but from what I read here online, due to the final taste of cocktails and the service of supervision, there is no way to work, despite the taste of taste that at the end of everything, try to complement without flavorless cocktails, and without soul.

First request from this restaurant was delivery, we chose tilapia the breaded with rice and puree. Tasty food, it arrived warm, polite delivery man, but warned us that it is even better to eat at the scene (we will soon). Portion of well served fish, served 3 people and still was left. The portions of rice (loose and seasoned, you feel the aroma of food made on the spot) and puree portion are less generous, yet it is worth it.

The second visit went to lunch at the scene. Very tasty food, seasoning, combinations. We ordered a dish for 5 and found it small for 5 adults. We complemented with other requests. The place is crowded all day, important to arrive early for lunch.

The service on the phone is well hurried and we have difficulty analyzing menu, because it is not available complete on Instagram and also we do not receive through WhatsApp. For the choice of dish we went through the posts on INSTA and confirmed price with the attendant. The service on site is good, but as it is very full sometimes there is some forgetfulness of the waiter. Normal.

I will certainly come back more often.

texto:
Eu sou cliente do Reserva 62 desde 2020, realmente gosto do ambiente, do atendimento e principalmente da comida.
Para quem possui crian√ßas, √© uma das melhores op√ß√µes da regi√£o em termos de brinquedoteca, que √© ampla e bem equipada, alem de contar com cuidadora sem custo extra.
Em rela√ß√£o √† limpeza do local, nunca tive problemas. Sal√£o √© banheiro sempre limpos.
A comida √© o que me ganha, possui um custo m√©dio de R$40 por pessoa. Na minha √∫ltima visita pedi de entrada o bolinho de cupim aioli e como prato principal o salm√£o grelhado. Sabe aquela comida que voc√™ sente feliz ao comer? √â essa aqui!
Prato bem servido e gostoso, s√≥ demorou um pouco, m√©dia de 20 minutos de espera.
A √∫nica desvantagem que vejo √© n√£o possuir estacionamento, mas √© um problema comum com os outros bares/restaurantes da regi√£o.
Super recomendo!
texto_traduzido:
I have been a client of Reserve 62 since 2020, I really like the environment, the service and especially the food.
For those who have children, it is one of the best options in the region in terms of playroom, which is wide and well equipped, besides having careful care at no extra cost.
Regarding the cleaning of the place, I never had problems. Room is always clean bathroom.
The food is what you get me, has an average cost of $ 40 per person. On my last visit I ordered the Aioli Termite Cup and as the main course the grilled salmon. Do you know that food you feel happy to eat? This is this one!
Well served and tasty dish, it only took a while, an average of 20 minutes waiting.
The only disadvantage I see is not having parking, but it is a common problem with the other bars/restaurants in the region.
Super recommend!

texto:
. Primeira experi√™ncia no local e n√£o foi nada satisfat√≥ria.

. Come√ßa pelo menu integrante do festival gastron√¥mico (que era a inten√ß√£o). Descobrimos l√° que o menu era fechado, sem op√ß√£o de escolha e que era menu degusta√ß√£o.¬† Nada dissoestava descrito na propaganda do festival. O chef ofereceu uma op√ß√£o de fazer um prato do card√°pio com pre√ßo de card√°pio que n√£o compensaria.

. Partimos para o card√°pio da casa. Entrada disco de peixe,¬† por√ß√£o √© diferente, o disco √© bastante¬† cremoso e estava saboroso,¬† por√©m a fritura exageradamente encharcada de gordura.

. Os pratos escolhidos foram parmegiana de frango - a temperatura da comida estava quase fria, frango fatia fin√≠ssima e carne muito branca, visivelmente mal temperada, mussarela pouco derretida, molho muito √°cido, uma pitada de batata e arroz mais ou menos. O segundo prato carbonara de camar√£o, vieram 4 camar√µes no prato. Estava apenas bom.

. Pre√ßos salgadiss√≠mos X o que recebemos na mesa.¬† Pagamos uma conta muito cara, n√£o comemos (parmegiana) ficou mais da metade no prato, sa√≠mos insatisfeitos e com fome.

.¬† N√£o pretendo retornar.
texto_traduzido:
. First experience on site and it was not at all satisfactory.

. It starts with the member menu of the gastronomic festival (which was the intention). We found that the menu was closed, with no choice and that it was a tasting menu. None of that was described in the propaganda of the festival. The chef offered an option to make a menu dish with a menu price that would not compensate.

. We left for the menu of the house. Fish disc entry, portion is different, the disc is quite creamy and was tasty, but the frying exaggerated fat.

. The chosen dishes were chicken Parmegiana - the temperature of the food was almost cold, very fine slice chicken and very white meat, visibly badly seasoned, low melted mozzarella, very acid sauce, a pinch of potatoes and rice more or less. The second carbonara dish of shrimp, came 4 shrimps on the plate. It was just good.

. Salgadessimal prices x what we received at the table. We paid a very expensive account, we did not eat (Parmegiana) was more than half on the plate, we left dissatisfied and hungry.

. I do not intend to return.

Ambiente √© bom, agrad√°vel e limpo! Mas fui nesse domingo, 18/06/2023. Pedimos um disco de peixe. Aparentemente bonito, mas sem tempero, e sabor. Comida insossa. Tamb√©m pedimos Jil√≥, veio Muito pouco e novamente sem tempero nenhum. Posteriormente pedimos um prato de picanha e pra variar, veio no ponto errado e tamb√©m N√ÉO ERA PICANHA. Absurdo isso!!! Al√©m do mais, o arroz estava duro (pouco cozido e velho) dava pra perceber que tanto o arroz quanto a batata Chips era de dia ou dias anteriores. Reclamei pro gar√ßom, pois √© direto, afinal estou pagando por um almo√ßo no domingo em fam√≠lia. Mas nada foi feito. Ent√£o N√ÉO RECOMENDO E N√ÉO VOLTO MAIS NESTE RESTAURANTE.

O AMBIENTE √â LINDO, agrad√°vel e os gar√ßons simp√°ticos, nada contra. Mas a comida √© P√âSSIMA! PAGUEI caro e sai com fome!!! Pedi pra passar um pouco mais a picanha (que n√£o era picanha e veio QUEIMADA) ou seja, muito ruim!!!

NAO RECOMENDO!!!
texto_traduzido:
Environment is good, nice and clean! But I went this Sunday, 06/18/2023. We ordered a fish disk. Apparently beautiful, but without seasoning, and taste. Dull food. We also ordered Jil√≥, came very little and again without any seasoning. Later we ordered a plate of picanha and for a change, came at the wrong point and was not picanha either. ABSURD THAT !!! What's more, the rice was hard (little cooked and old) you could see that both rice and potato chips were day or earlier days. I complained to the waiter, because it is straightforward, after all I am paying for a lunch on Sunday in family. But nothing was done. So I do not recommend and I will not be back in this restaurant.

The atmosphere is beautiful, nice and the friendly waiters, nothing against it. But the food is terrible! I paid dearly and comes out hungry !!! I asked to pass the picanha a little more (which was not picanha and came burned) that is, very bad !!!

I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!

04/06/2023
Infelizmente n√£o h√° como atualizar a avalia√ß√£o. Entretanto, a din√¢mica dos pedidos deixa muito a desejar. √â necess√°rio criar uma din√¢mica de tempo entre os pedidos, hoje por exemplo ficamos (estamos esperando) uma por√ß√£o a mais de 1h30 minutos. Bom, vamos as devidas considera√ß√µes. Eu frequento este local h√° [17 anos]. E durante, todo esse per√≠odo o mesmo sofreu algumas mudan√ßas consider√°veis, desde os propriet√°rios at√© reformas. Entretanto, estamos em pleno 2022, e alguns erros persistem. E devemos considerar muito, estes aspectos pois causa um impacto em toda a din√¢mica do local. Considero, o bar como o ‚Äúbar do tanto faz‚Äù; Explico: 1) a comida n√£o √© padronizada h√° dias que est√° suculenta outros est√° ou salgada ou ressecada; 2) sempre tive problemas com valores, parece que as bebidas sofrem altera√ß√£o (para + ou -) conforme o dia ou com de quem faz o c√°lculo (por isso fico atento); 3) a climatiza√ß√£o √© a quest√£o principalmente, n√£o consigo entender ou compreender a aus√™ncia de ventiladores / umidificadores no local - √© algo lastim√°vel, decidiram colocar um toldo para prote√ß√£o solar, entretanto,  n√£o investiram em uma climatiza√ß√£o adequada. Como estamos, em uma capital da qual o tempo √© seco e etc, isso torna-se injustific√°vel (completamente sem no√ß√£o); 4) a din√¢mica dos gar√ßons deixa a desejar, s√£o dispersos na grande parte, o ambiente (tamanho) n√£o √© grande - esquecem dos pedidos, as vezes demora a reposi√ß√£o das bebidas, demoram limpar as mesas, recolher os pratos e etc . O cliente tem que muitas vezes, at√© exigir a conta para pagar ou levantar para pedir algo; 5) as por√ß√µes n√£o s√£o t√£o generosas em compara√ß√£o aos valores propostos; e 6) h√° sim, a cultura de ‚Äúprefer√™ncia‚Äù, algumas mesas s√£o mais bem atendidas devido uma quest√£o de amizade (fam√≠lia e etc). Ou seja, o local tem tudo para dar certo, √© um ambiente familiar/agrad√°vel, sem restri√ß√µes p√∫blico e etc. Entretanto, √© necess√°rio muita paci√™ncia e flexibilidade para as vezes passar por determinadas situa√ß√µes. Detalhe, como o centro de Goi√¢nia sofre com a aus√™ncia de locais abertos (bares, shopping, restaurantes e etc) tudo poderia ser de excel√™ncia, mas isso depende dos pr√≥prios e n√£o do p√∫blico. Como elogio restrito a trilha sonora que √© top (MPB no 12) foge do tradicional Sertanojo. Aten√ß√£o: POMBO √â VETOR DE DOEN√áAS. 06/04/2023
Unfortunately there is no way to update the evaluation. However, the dynamics of requests leave much to be desired. It is necessary to create a time dynamics between orders, today for example we stay (we are waiting) a portion for over 1h30 minutes. There is a disorganization between orders and between dishes (local audience and iFood).

Well, let's go to the appropriate considerations. I have been going to this place for [17 years]. And during, all this period has undergone some considerable changes, from owners to reforms. However, we are in the middle of 2022, and some errors persist. And we must consider a lot, these aspects because it has an impact on the whole dynamics of the place. I consider the bar as the ‚Äúbar of both it‚Äù; I explain: 1) Food has not been standardized for days that is succulent others is either salty or dry; 2) I have always had problems with values, it seems that the drinks change (to + or -) according to the day or with the calculation of (so I get aware); 3) Climatization is the question mainly, I can not understand or understand the absence of fans / humidifiers on site - it is something pitiful, they decided to put a sunscreen awning, however, they did not invested in adequate climatization. As we are, in a capital of which time is dry and so on, this becomes unjustifiable (completely clueless); 4) The dynamics of the waiters leave something to be desired, are dispersed in the most part, the environment (size) is not large - they forget the orders, sometimes it takes to replace the drinks, it takes to clean the tables, collect the dishes and etc. The customer has to many times, until demanding the bill to pay or get up to ask for something; 5) portions are not so generous compared to the proposed values; And 6) There is yes, the culture of ‚Äúpreference‚Äù, some tables are better served due to a matter of friendship (family and etc). That is, the place has everything to work, is a family/pleasant environment, without public restrictions and so on. However, much patience and flexibility is required to sometimes go through certain situations. Detail, as the center of Goi√¢nia suffers from the absence of open places (bars, shopping, restaurants and etc) could all be of excellence, but it depends on themselves and not on the public. As a restricted compliment the soundtrack that is top (MPB no 12) escapes the traditional backcountry. Attention: Pigeon is a vector of disease. At this moment, 1:14 pm a family composed of 8 people gave up on the scene due to air conditioning.

texto:
- Salve! Gor√≥, borogod√≥ e ziriguidum, ou simplesmente "Salve", √© um bar descontra√≠do e divertido, perfeito para quem quer relaxar e se divertir com amigos.
- O ambiente √© agrad√°vel e espa√ßoso, com mesas e cadeiras em madeira r√∫stica, e deck ao ar livre para os fumantes.
- O bar possui um grande palco, perfeito para shows ao vivo, DJ sets e tudo o mais que envolva m√∫sica, dan√ßa e entretenimento.
- As bebidas oferecidas s√£o variadas e bem-feitas, desde as tradicionais cervejas, destilados como whisky e vodka, at√© coquet√©is mais elaborados, que s√£o misturados com criatividade pelos funcion√°rios experientes do bar.
- Al√©m disso, h√° v√°rios pontos de banheiro, garantindo que os clientes n√£o precisem esperar em longas filas.
- A limpeza √© um aspecto muito importante para a equipe de "Salve", e portanto, as mesas e o piso s√£o constantemente limpos e desinfetados.
- A cereja do bolo √© a simpatia e prestatividade dos funcion√°rios do bar, que est√£o sempre prontos para ajudar os clientes com um sorriso no rosto.
texto_traduzido:
- Save! Gor√≥, Borod√≥ and Ziriguidum, or simply "Salve", is a relaxed and fun bar, perfect for those who want to relax and have fun with friends.
- The atmosphere is pleasant and spacious, with rustic wood tables and chairs, and outdoor deck for smokers.
- The bar has a big stage, perfect for live shows, DJ sets and everything that involves music, dance and entertainment.
- The drinks offered are varied and well-fitted, from traditional beers, distilled such as whiskey and vodka, to more elaborate cocktails, which are mixed with creativity by the bar's experienced staff.
- In addition, there are several bathroom points, ensuring that customers don't have to wait for long lines.
- Cleaning is a very important aspect for the "save" team, so the tables and the floor are constantly clean and disinfected.
- The icing on the cake is the sympathy and helpfulness of bar staff, who are always ready to help customers with a smile on their face.

Fomos em um grupo de 15 amigos comemorar um anivers√°rio neste s√°bado. Chegando l√°, pedimos aos gar√ßons que pudessem juntar umas 3 mesas de in√≠cio que encontramos e eles fizeram desfeita alegando n√£o ter como juntar, at√© ent√£o resolvemos nos virar.
Pedimos uma entrada, que veio r√°pido, por√©m, ao pedir uma Chapa de Carne, a mesma demorou 1h 20min para chegar a nossa mesa (chegou todos os convidados e o prato nada). Pessoas que chegaram bem depois de n√≥s pediram esse mesmo prato e receberam muito mais antecipadamente do que a gente. N√£o sei se resolveram fazer de prop√≥sito conosco, mas sei que nosso atendimento foi horr√≠vel do in√≠cio ao fim.
O pre√ßo referente aos pratos n√£o condiz, j√° que achamos que os pratos eram um pouco maiores e pagamos caro por algo que n√£o se compara. As bebidas foram as √∫nicas coisas que n√£o demoraram a chegar, mas com alguns deslizes, como: clericot de tangerina, nada muito a ver com o que a bebida possui, e quase sem frutas.
No atendimento, foi MUITO demorado para a gente, alguns gar√ßons mal educados e um sistema de funcionamento que, sinceramente, precisa de muitas melhorias.
√â a primeira e √∫ltima vez de todos n√≥s nesse local, que s√≥ tem nome e apar√™ncia. Dando uma estrela j√° que zero n√£o tem como.
texto_traduzido:
We went to a group of 15 friends to celebrate a birthday this Saturday. Getting there, we asked the waiters to put about 3 start tables we found and they did undone claiming not to gather, until then we decided to turn around.
We ordered an entrance, which came fast, but asking for a meat plate, it took 1h 20min to reach our table (arrived all the guests and the dish nothing). People who arrived well after us asked for this same dish and received much more in advance than us. I don't know if they decided to do us on purpose, but I know our service was horrible from start to finish.
The price for dishes does not match, as we think the dishes were a little bigger and paid dearly for something that does not compare. The drinks were the only things that were not slow to arrive, but with some slips, such as: Clericot of tangerine, nothing much to do with what the drink has, and almost without fruit.
In the service, it was very time consuming for us, some rude waiters and a operating system that honestly needs many improvements.
It is the first and last time of all of us in this place, which only has name and appearance. Giving a star since zero has no way.
